renewal.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when an activity, situation, or process begins again after a period when it had stopped
renewal.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Spring is a time of renewal.
a renewal of the recent conflict
renewal.translation[0].definitions[1].de: when you make an agreement or official document continue for a further period of time after it ends
renewal.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Mark’s contract comes up for renewal at the end of this year.
the renewal of our annual licence
renewal.translation[1].definitions[0].de: when people arrange for a contract, agreement, deal etc to continue
renewal.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The contractcomes up for renewal next year.
The government can deny license renewals if a station doesn’t carry adequate programming for children.
renewal.translation[1].definitions[1].de: when a company, economy, area etc is changed and improved
renewal.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: proposals for economic renewal and growth
